name: My Pet Hotel 2
description:
A lot of exciting tasks and different pets are waiting for you! You will be in charge of caring for each little fosterling personally. The playful little pets will need a lot of attention when running around lumbering. Teach your animals tricks and pamper them with nice treats. When having achieved a task very well you will get “extras” to upgrade your pet hotel to lead your pet hotel to worldclass success!Features
  • 15 new and individual missions to accomplish
  • Various opportunities for individual interaction with animals
  • Highly detailed graphics of pets, objects, setting and movements
